name: Tic Tac Toe 2 The Expansion
description:
The new expansion update of tic tac toe.

For years the biggest fault of tic tac toe is how often you end up in a tie game, in this update instead of tying the game keeps going by allowing the last player who played to choose a direction to expand the board in by using the arrow keys.

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys: expand board

R: reset board
